title: Soy Dipping Sauce
source: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
categories: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
ingredients: - 1 or 2 Thai chilies, thinly sliced (depending on how spicy you like)
directions: Whisk together the soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar in a medium bowl, add the chilies, and let sit at room temperature for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld. Refrigerate in an airtight container for up to 1 week.
